name: A Normal Game (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
This Is A Perfectly Normal Game Where You Complete A Series Of Perfectly Normal Puzzles Involving Pressure Pads, Boxes, Traps And More!

The Game Involves You Trying To Escape Out Of A Mysterious Building After Being Taken There For An Unknown Reason. You Are Guided By A Narrator Who Communicates To You By Displaying Messages On A TV Screen Telling You How The Mechanics Work. With His help You Must Get Out Of The Building And Also Collect Some Orbs Along The Way!

This Game is Actually Based Off Of A VERY Old Project Of Mine Which Got Scrapped With The Same Concept And Even The Same Name. I Wasn't Even Here When I Worked On It.

Also Sorry For The Hiatus. Will Hopefully Be Back With Regularly Scedualed Shovelware Soon :)

Source Code:https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/A-Normal-Game-Source

(Most) Textures From:https://ambientcg.com/

Ending Skybox From:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/free-hdr-sky-612...
